property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may draw a card. Double breaker

alternate.name: Gallows Devil Dragon, Dead Sea Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent can't cast spells or summon creatures for no cost. Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owner's hand. Triple breaker Link Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever your shields break, look at that shield. You may put it into your graveyard instead of your hand. If you do, you may put a Hunter psychic creature from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone that costs the same as the card that you put into your graveyard. Double breaker

alternate.name: Gaial King Dragon, Raging Dragon Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have less power than it. World breaker Link Release

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, your opponent chooses one of his untapped creatures in the battle zone and taps it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player shuffles his hand and graveyard into his deck. Then each player draws 5 cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy any number of your other creatures. For each creature destroyed, you may put a psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Water: Discard all cards in your hand, then draw 5 cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Nature: This turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets +5000 power and breaks an additional shield, and whenever that creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Beast Folk. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light or fire creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a light or fire card in your mana zone and add it to your shields face down. Power Attacker +3000 Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Evolution - Put on one of your Angel Commands. Your opponent's creatures that have power 5000 or less can't attack. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Crew breaker - Blocker (This creature breaks one more shield for each of your other creatures that have 'Blocker' in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Darkness: Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal a card from your hand chosen by your opponent at random. If that card is a non-evolution creature you may return one of your creatures from the battle zone to your hand. If you do, put the revealed creature into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water or fire creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a Water, Darkness, or Fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature or another Hunter into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If you do, choose a non-evolution creature in your opponent's graveyard. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone. Hunting Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Hunter creatures. This creature can attack untapped psychic creatures. Whenever this creature attacks and wins a battle, untap this creature, then choose one of your opponent's shields. Your opponent returns that shield to his hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Hunters attacks, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a non-evolution Hunter creature that costs less than the attacking creature, you may put it into the battle zone. Hunting Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Hunters. Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a Hunter creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the total number of cards in your mana zone. Put that creature into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Fire: Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 6000 power or less. Whenever this creature attacks, you may return a fire card from your mana zone to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water or nature creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then, you may put a card from your hand into your mana zone. Double breaker

card.name: Elnath Gaga, Enforcer of Tectonic Shifts

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Nature: Return a card from your mana zone to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. (First choose what this creature is attacking. Then choose a creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Space Charge- Water: Look at one of your opponent's shields. You may have your opponent put the top card of his deck under that shield. If you do, your opponent chooses a card you looked at, and puts it on the bottom of his deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has 'Blocker' from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Evolution - Put on one of your light or darkness creatures. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, your light or darkness creatures can't be chosen. (They can still be attacked or blocked.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Hunting Whenever one of your Hunters win a battle, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put a card into your hand and the other card on the bottom of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature battles, you may return your opponent's battling creature to its owner's hand. While you have 2 or fewer shields, this creature gets +2000 power and 'Blocker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature battles, you may return your opponent's battling creature to its owner's hand. While you have 2 or fewer shields, this creature gets +2000 power and 'Blocker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Name a card. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal that name. Put all revealed cards into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw up to 2 cards. Until the start of your next turn, whenever your Gallows Cebu Kaiser would leave the battle zone, it stays in the battle zone instead. When your Gallows Cebu Kaiser would leave the battle zone, you may discard this card instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw up to 2 cards. Until the start of your next turn, whenever your Gallows Cebu Kaiser would leave the battle zone, it stays in the battle zone instead. When your Gallows Cebu Kaiser would leave the battle zone, you may discard this card instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a fire card, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. If that card is a water card, you may draw a card. Double breaker

property.value: When you put this creature or another Darkness hunter into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. During your opponent's next turn, that creatures attacks if able. Hunting

property.value: Space Charge- Darkness: Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put that Dragon into the battle zone. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. For each light card put into your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. For each fire card put into your mana zone, this turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'Power Attacker +2000'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent's spells cost 1 more to cast. Psychic Link - At the start of your turn, if you have Geo the Man, Earth Titan in the battle zone, link it to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side.

Rules
property.value: Put a non-evolution light creature that has 'Blocker' from your hand into the battle zone. property.value: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Aliens are destroyed by your opponent's spells, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Whenever one of your Aliens has its power reduced to 0 or less by your opponent's spells, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Psychic Link - At the start of your turn, if you have a Gallows Cebu Kaiser and a Hydra Gilsaurus in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side..
